name: Cloudy Puff
description:
Cloudy puff is a multiplayer party game where players have to build the most awesome storm that will hit the small city under them.

This game was made in two days for the competition Pixel Challenge 2018 at Quebec city.

The theme was "the perfect storm".

Programmers

  • Jean-René Choinière
  • Maxim Daigle
  • Patrice Robitaille

Sound

  • Xavier-Charles Fecteau

Artists

  • Nina Marchand
  • Bianka Chandler Boivert
